definition: as one wishes/as one pleases/at random/negligent/casual/wanton
surname Sui
to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
see 便宜|便宜[pian2 yi5]
to act unappreciatively in response to a kindness
pinyin: ba3 fang1 bian4 dang4 sui2 bian4

sentences.english: There aring a lot of secrets in the man heart can't say literally that let wife listen to.
sentences.chinese: 男人心中有好多秘密不能随便说给妻子听。

sentences.english: Here is a restaurant where you pay fixed price and eat adlib .
sentences.chinese: 这里有一家餐馆，你付一定的钱随便吃。

sentences.english: If only you the most casual greetings, can let me feel you are too warm heart.
sentences.chinese: 即使只是你最随便的问候，都会让我觉得你太暖心。

sentences.english: Do something other than check your email when you wake.
sentences.chinese: 醒来时随便做点什么，但不要去翻看你的电子邮件。

sentences.english: Ron Artest likes basketball because he gets to shoot around.
sentences.chinese: 阿泰喜欢篮球由于他喜欢随便射的感觉。

sentences.english: Nothing really. I'm in Slavic studies.
sentences.chinese: 随便说说，我是学斯拉夫语的。

sentences.english: Problem is that I don't know of one, offhand.
sentences.chinese: 问题在于，我一个都不知道，随便吧。

sentences.english: By the way, I don't want a night flight.
sentences.chinese: 随便提一下，我不要夜航班机。

sentences.english: The Children make free with the apples.
I hope you're lying for the sake of titillation .
sentences.chinese: 我希望你是随便开玩笑的意思。
她只不过是随便搞一下化学。

sentences.english: I was on the good friends with people.
sentences.chinese: 我就在好友上随便加了好多人。
或者随便说些起作用的话语。

sentences.english: Never clear off your desk by randomly throwing things in a drawer.
sentences.chinese: 不要为了收拾整顿你的桌子而随便把东西扔进抽斗里。

sentences.english: Rub the cream, for heating, which is more easily absorbed by the skin.
sentences.chinese: 搓，给眼霜减温，使之更随便被肌肤收受。

sentences.english: Let's not just arbitrarily say the number 0 is false, the number 1 is true.
sentences.chinese: 当然我们不能随便就说0就是假，1就是真。

definition: as one wishes/according to one's wishes/at will/voluntary/conscious
conveniently/without extra trouble/while doing it/in passing
(coll.) if
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
easily/lightly/rashly
granted that/even if
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
straightforward/clear-cut/blunt (e.g. statement)/you might as well/simply
if only/so long as
even/even if/even though/no matter how
that's just the way it is/exactly!
as before/(same) as usual/in the same manner/still/nevertheless
to try to find/to look for/to call on sb/to find/to seek/to return/to give change
household/dwelling/family/sb else's house/household business/house of woman's husband-to-be/CL:戶|户[hu4],家[jia1]
other people/sb else/he, she or they/I, me (referring to oneself as "one" or "people")
need not
